memories.subject: fetch emails
memories.action_taken:
I can't directly access your personal email accounts due to privacy and security protocols.

If you'd like me to help manage your emails, you would need to set up an integration with your email service and grant the necessary permissions.

Is this something you'd like to explore, or were you perhaps looking for information about setting up email notifications within this application?

memories.subject: reply to 1
memories.action_taken: What would you like to say in your reply?

memories.subject: send email to loborostan05@gmail.com
memories.action_taken:
Okay, I can help you send an email to loborostan05@gmail.com.

What should be the subject of the email, and what message would you like to include in the body?
